text: @DeAnna4Congress This is where we’re at. Trump supporters going nuts that he drank water with one hand. Meanwhile, COVID19 is still going nuts, protests continue to happen, and Bolton’s book just gave us an inside to the evilness of this man. But hey, he drank water with one hand!
